articles.title: Warriors' Draymond Green gets 1-game ban for stomping on Sabonis - ESPN
articles.description: Warriors forward Draymond Green received a one-game suspension for stepping on the chest of Sacramento's Domantas Sabonis in Game 2, the NBA announced.
articles.content: SAN FRANCISCO -- The NBA has suspended Golden State Warriors forward Draymond Green for one game for stepping on the chest of the Sacramento Kings' Domantas Sabonis, the league announced Tuesday nigh… [+2098 chars]
